member.name: T:CMS.Personas.PersonasModule
member.summary: Represents entry point of the Persona Based Recommendations (or shortly Personas) module. This module allows CMS users to define Personas representing groups of visitors/customer. member.name: T:CMS.Personas.ContactPersonaEvaluator
member.summary: Contains methods for reevaluation of contact's persona.
member.remarks: Contact can be in one persona only - contact belongs to persona if score quotient (contact score points divided by persona score limit) is the highest one of all personas.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Reevaluates all contacts and assigns them to proper persona.
member.remarks: This method should be used when persona properties were changed, or rules were recalculated.

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.ContactPersonaEvaluator.ReevaluateAllContactsAsync
member.summary: Reevaluates all contacts and assigns them to proper persona asynchronously.
member.remarks: This method should be used when persona properties were changed, or rules were recalculated.
member.returns: Asynchronous execution task

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.ContactPersonaEvaluator.ReevaluateContacts(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Reevaluates given contacts and assigns them to proper persona.
member.remarks: This method should be used when new activity is logged for contact or its attribute was changed. These actions can change contact points and thus it is possible the contact can be assigned to more correct persona.
member.param: Contacts which should be assigned to persona

member.returns: Asynchronous execution task

member.name: T:CMS.Personas.IPersonaChangesPropagator
member.summary: Handles propagation of changes after persona is updated.
member.remarks: Use to obtain implementation of this interface. Changes are either propagated to underlying score or reevaluation of contact persona is executed.

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.IPersonaChangesPropagator.PropagatePersonaChanges(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Int32,CMS.Personas.PersonaInfo)
member.summary: Checks changed columns of persona and propagate changes either to underlying score or contacts the persona is assigned to.
member.remarks: If persona was enabled, evaluation is executed for all contacts, but score is not recalculated. If persona was disabled, evaluation is executed for all contacts assigned to current persona. If persona point threshold increased, evaluation is executed for all contacts assigned to the persona. If persona point threshold decreased, evaluation is executed for all contacts not assigned to the persona. If persona display name was changed, change is propagated to underlying score display name.
member.param: Points limit for persona before persona was changed

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.IPersonaChangesPropagator.PropagatePersonaDeletion(CMS.Personas.PersonaInfo)
member.summary: Reevaluates all contacts and delete persona underlying score.

member.name: T:CMS.Personas.PersonaChangesPropagator
member.summary: Handles propagation of changes after persona is updated.
member.remarks: Changes are either propagated to underlying score or reevaluation of contact persona is executed.

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PersonaChangesPropagator.#ctor(CMS.ContactManagement.IScoreInfoProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PersonaChangesPropagator.PropagatePersonaChanges(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Int32,CMS.Personas.PersonaInfo)
member.summary: Checks changed columns of persona and propagate changes either to underlying score or contacts the persona is assigned to.
member.remarks: If persona properties were changed, evaluation is executed for all contacts.
member.param: Points limit for persona before persona was changed

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PersonaChangesPropagator.PropagatePersonaDeletion(CMS.Personas.PersonaInfo)
member.summary: Reevaluates all contacts and delete persona underlying score.

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PersonaChangesPropagator.PropagatePersonaEnabledChangeToScore(CMS.Personas.PersonaInfo,CMS.ContactManagement.ScoreInfo)
member.summary: Copies changes of PersonaEnabled flag to ScoreInfo object.

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PersonaChangesPropagator.PropagatePersonaDisplayNameChangeToScore(CMS.Personas.PersonaInfo,CMS.ContactManagement.ScoreInfo)
member.summary: Copies changes in PersonaDisplayName field to ScoreInfo object.

member.name: T:CMS.Personas.IPersonaService
member.summary: Provides methods to determine membership of contacts in personas.
member.remarks: Use to obtain implementation of this interface. Contact can be in one persona only - contact belongs to persona if score quotient (contact score points divided by persona score limit) is the highest one of all personas.

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.IPersonaService.IsContactInPersona(CMS.ContactManagement.ContactInfo,CMS.Personas.PersonaInfo)
member.summary: Returns true when contact belongs to specified persona.
member.remarks: The contact can be only in one persona at the same time. Belonging to persona is determined by the highest quotient of total score the contact obtained divided by persona score limit.
member.returns: True when contact fulfills persona definition

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.IPersonaService.GetPersonaForContact(CMS.ContactManagement.ContactInfo)
member.summary: Gets persona the specified contact is assigned to or null of contact does not belong to any persona.
member.remarks: The contact can be only in one persona at the same time. Belonging to persona is determined by the highest quotient of total score the contact obtained divided by persona score limit.
member.returns: Persona that specified contact belongs to or null

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.IPersonaService.GetContactsForPersona(CMS.Personas.PersonaInfo)
member.summary: Gets all contacts that fulfills persona definition.
member.remarks: The contact can be only in one persona at the same time. Belonging to persona is determined by the highest quotient of total score the contact obtained divided by persona score limit.
member.returns: All contacts that fulfills persona definition

member.name: T:CMS.Personas.PagePreviewPersonaService
member.summary: Provides methods to determine membership of contacts in personas. Takes into account persona which is enforced in the page preview mode when user wants to see how page looks like for certain persona. This persona is taken into account only if caller is asking for personas for current contact.
member.remarks: This is the implementation of the interface which is used in the page preview mode. Please obtain its instance via .

member.name: P:CMS.Personas.PagePreviewPersonaService.EnforcedPersona
member.summary: Persona enforced by the user. If null, user wants to see page as someone who is not assigned to any persona.

member.name: P:CMS.Personas.PagePreviewPersonaService.ActAsContactWithoutPersona
member.summary: If true, user wants to see page as someone who is not assigned to any persona.

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PagePreviewPersonaService.#ctor(CMS.Personas.IPersonaService,CMS.ContactManagement.ContactInfo,CMS.Personas.IPreviewPersonaStorage)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Service which defines relationships between personas and contacts by default
Storage for saving and retrieving personas which should be displayed in the preview mode

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PagePreviewPersonaService.IsContactInPersona(CMS.ContactManagement.ContactInfo,CMS.Personas.PersonaInfo)
member.summary: Returns true when contact belongs to specified persona.
member.remarks: The contact can be only in one persona at the same time. Belonging to persona is determined by the highest quotient of total score the contact obtained divided by persona score limit.
member.returns: True when contact fulfills persona definition

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PagePreviewPersonaService.GetPersonaForContact(CMS.ContactManagement.ContactInfo)
member.summary: Gets persona the specified contact is assigned to or null of contact does not belong to any persona.
member.remarks: The contact can be only in one persona at the same time. Belonging to persona is determined by the highest quotient of total score the contact obtained divided by persona score limit.
member.returns: Persona that specified contact belongs to or null

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PagePreviewPersonaService.GetContactsForPersona(CMS.Personas.PersonaInfo)
member.summary: Gets all contacts that fulfills persona definition.
member.remarks: The contact can be only in one persona at the same time. Belonging to persona is determined by the highest quotient of total score the contact obtained divided by persona score limit.
member.returns: All contacts that fulfills persona definition

member.name: T:CMS.Personas.PersonaService
member.summary: Provides methods to determine membership of contacts in personas.
member.remarks: This is the default implementation of the interface. Please obtain its instance via . Contact can be in one persona only - contact belongs to persona if score quotient (contact score points divided by persona score limit) is the highest one of all personas.

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PersonaService.#ctor(CMS.ContactManagement.IContactInfoProvider,CMS.Personas.IPersonaInfoProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PersonaService.IsContactInPersona(CMS.ContactManagement.ContactInfo,CMS.Personas.PersonaInfo)
member.summary: Returns true when contact belongs to specified persona.
member.remarks: The contact can be only in one persona at the same time. Belonging to persona is determined by the highest quotient of total score the contact obtained divided by persona score limit.
member.returns: True when contact fulfills persona definition

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PersonaService.GetPersonaForContact(CMS.ContactManagement.ContactInfo)
member.summary: Gets persona the specified contact is assigned to or null of contact does not belong to any persona.
member.remarks: The contact can be only in one persona at the same time. Belonging to persona is determined by the highest quotient of total score the contact obtained divided by persona score limit.
member.returns: Persona that specified contact belongs to or null

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PersonaService.GetContactsForPersona(CMS.Personas.PersonaInfo)
member.summary: Gets all contacts that fulfills persona definition.
member.remarks: The contact can be only in one persona at the same time. Belonging to persona is determined by the highest quotient of total score the contact obtained divided by persona score limit.
member.returns: All contacts that fulfills persona definition

member.name: T:CMS.Personas.PersonasFactory
member.summary: Factory to access classes of the Personas module.

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PersonasFactory.GetPersonaService
member.summary: Provides services for persona.
member.remarks: This method returns special implementation in the preview mode (). That special implementation takes into account persona which is enforced in the page preview mode when user wants to see how page looks like for certain persona. This persona is taken into account only if caller is asking for personas for current contact.
member.returns: Service for determining membership of contacts in personas

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PersonasFactory.GetContactPersonaEvaluator
member.summary: Provides services for reevaluating contact's persona.
member.remarks: Reevaluation should be performed after every change of contact's score to ensure the contact belongs to the right persona.
member.returns: Service for reevaluation of to which persona the contact belongs

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PersonasFactory.GetPersonaChangesPropagator
member.summary: Handles propagation of changes after persona is updated.
member.remarks: Changes are either propagated to underlying score or reevaluation of contact persona is executed.
member.returns: Service for propagation the persona changes to underlying score or to contact persona evaluator

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PersonasFactory.GetPreviewPersonaStorage
member.summary: Gets implementation of storage for saving and retrieving personas which should be displayed in the preview mode.
member.returns: Preview persona storage

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PersonasFactory.GetPersonaPictureUrlCreator
member.summary: Gets implementation of the service for creating persona picture URLs.

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.PersonasFactory.GetPersonaPictureImgTagGenerator
member.summary: Gets implementation of service for generating img tags of persona pictures.
member.returns: Persona picture img tag generator

member.name: T:CMS.Personas.IPreviewPersonaStorage
member.summary: Defines contract for the storage for saving and retrieving personas which should be displayed in the preview mode.

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.IPreviewPersonaStorage.SetCurrentSiteID(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets siteID which will be then used when storing and retrieving personas. Personas on each site will be stored independently.
member.remarks: SiteID isn't set using constructor parameter, because our ObjectFactory does not support constructor injection

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.IPreviewPersonaStorage.StorePreviewPersona(CMS.Personas.PersonaInfo)
member.summary: Stores persona for the preview mode. When is called later, persona saved using this method is retrieved.
member.param: Persona enforced by the user. If null, user wants to see page as someone who is not assigned to any persona

member.name: M:CMS.Personas.IPreviewPersonaStorage.GetPreviewPersona
member.summary: Persona enforced by the user for the preview mode. If null, user wants to see page as someone who is not assigned to any persona.

member.name: T:CMS.Personas.PreviewPersonaSessionStorage
member.summary: Stores persona enforced for the preview mode in the session.
